languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас взгляд потемневших глаз.{/n} "Почему бы тебе само{mf|му|й} не ответить на этот вопрос?"
{n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас взгляд потемневших глаз.{/n} "Почему бы тебе само{mf|му|й} не ответить на этот вопрос?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着你，阴沉的双眼中满是不悦。{/n}“不如你自己来回答这个问题吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着你，阴沉的双眼中满是不悦。{/n}“不如你自己来回答这个问题吧？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira con sus ojos oscuros entrecerrados.{/n} «¿Por qué no responde a esa pregunta usted mism{mf|o|a}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira con sus ojos oscuros entrecerrados.{/n} «¿Por qué no responde a esa pregunta usted mism{mf|o|a}?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがあなたを見る。その目は暗く不満があふれている。{/n}「その質問には、ご自分でお答えになったらいかがですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがあなたを見る。その目は暗く不満があふれている。{/n}「その質問には、ご自分でお答えになったらいかがですか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard sombre.{/n} « Pourquoi ne pas répondre à cette question vous-même ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard sombre.{/n} « Pourquoi ne pas répondre à cette question vous-même ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, sein Blick ist finster.{/n} "Warum beantwortet Ihr Euch diese Frage nicht selbst?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, sein Blick ist finster.{/n} "Warum beantwortet Ihr Euch diese Frage nicht selbst?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, karanlığın kapladığı gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu soruya neden kendin yanıt vermiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes dark and louring.{/n} "Why don't you answer that question for yourself?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kararmış gözlerle ve kaşlarını çatarak sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu soruya neden kendin yanıt vermiyorsun?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
